definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: His idea of fun was to fly to Thailand to fight in a kickboxing tournament.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法就是去泰國參加跆拳錦標賽。

sentences.english: They qualified for the qualifying tourney by their finish in last year's regional tournaments.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過去年的地區選拔賽獲得了落選錦標賽的資格。

sentences.english: The border styles make it easy to see the results of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 邊界樣式的使用使查看錦標賽的結果非常容易。

sentences.english: We're still in with a chance of winning every tournament we entered in August.
sentences.chinese: 我們仍然有機會贏出所有在八月開始參加的錦標賽。

sentences.english: She described the stress she felt before the recent championships.
sentences.chinese: 她描述了在最近的錦標賽前她所感受到得壓力。

sentences.english: I competed in the 2009 FAI F3C world championship.
sentences.chinese: 我參加了2009國際航聯F3C世界錦標賽。

sentences.english: Free-flying aesthetes in the skies of Russia conclude the World Artistic Skydiving Championships.
sentences.chinese: 自由飛行審美家欣賞在俄羅斯舉行的世界跳傘錦標賽。

sentences.english: He was the No. 1 seed in the table-tennis championship.
sentences.chinese: 他是這屆乒乓球錦標賽頭號種子選手。

sentences.english: The tournament will be a round robinfor all the high school teams in the city.
sentences.chinese: 本屆全市中學隊錦標賽將進行循環賽。

sentences.english: The first World Shooting Championships were held in 1897.
sentences.chinese: 第一屆世界錦標賽舉行於1897年。

sentences.english: It's a different tournament because you play in a club.
sentences.chinese: 它是一項不同的錦標賽，因爲你在一個俱樂部裏比賽。

sentences.english: The first International Shooting Union World Championships were held in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 第一屆國際射擊聯盟世界錦標賽於1970年舉行。

sentences.english: This is her first time to take part in world championships.
sentences.chinese: 這是她第一次參加世界錦標賽。

sentences.english: He won the most titles ever on Australian Championships Mens Singles.
sentences.chinese: 他是澳大利亞錦標賽史上獲得男單冠軍最多的選手。

sentences.english: I quiet fast got good at mixed and almost from that day, I was the best junior double player in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我贏得了歐洲青年錦標賽的男雙和混雙的冠軍。

definition: invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
video gaming (as a sport)/e-sports (abbr. for 電子競技|电子竞技[dian4 zi3 jing4 ji4])
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
